mutants.original_line: """Reverses an array in-place. This means the existing array will be modified!
mutants.code:
def reverse_arr(arr):
    """"""
    start = 0

    while start < end:
        (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
        start += 1

def reverse_arr(arr):
    """Reverses an array in-place. This means the existing array will be modified!
    The function should handle cases where the input array contains duplicate and/or negative values."""
    start = 1
    end = len(arr) - 1
    while start < end:
        (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr

    The function should handle cases where the input array contains duplicate and/or negative values."""

    while start < end:
        (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    return arr
